name: ZZZZ Flickr WideScreen - (GM) - Flickr SET
description: IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen - DACKR Viewer ▷▷▷ Firefox Addons and Greasemonkey Scripts (GM) for Flickr. Read here which Flickr Greasemonkey Script (GM) you can use : "My BIG List Of Scripts", in "Flickr Hacks". ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too.
